description: The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) has a requirement to supply Federal Institutions under its control with standardized appliances and pricing on washers, dryers, refrigerators, freezers, ranges and microwaves to be purchased on an as-needed basis.  Up to 2 Regional Individual Standing Offers (RISOs) will be issued per Zone:  One PSIB stream and one non-PSIB stream.  In the event that two Standing Offers are issued for one zone, the PSIB Standing Offer holder will have First Right of Refusal in the issuance of call-ups. Offerors must provide firm unit pricing for two years for all items listed in the Basis of Payment to be considered for the issuance of a Standing Offer for this requirement.

full_summary:
### Institutional Appliances Request for Standing Offer

#### Details of the Request

* **Title (English)/Titre (Français)**: Stream 1 - 21401-230009 - Institutional Appliances RFSO - Zone 3 / Volet 1 - 21401-230009 - Appareils institutionnels DOC - Zone 3
* **Reference Number (Numéro de référence)**: WS4317503849-Doc4415886805
* **Publication Date (Date de publication)**: February 26, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date (Date de clôture de l'appel d'offres)**: April 19, 2024 (14:00 EDT)
* **Expected Contract Start Date (Date de début prévue du contrat)**: March 29, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date (Date de fin prévue du contrat)**: March 31, 2029
* **Notice Type (Type d'avis)**: Request for Standing Offer / Demande d'offre à commandes

#### Goods and Services

* This is a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) to procure institutional appliances and related products from qualified suppliers.
* The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) will issue a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) to qualified suppliers, valid for up to two years.
* The RISO will be used to provide appliances to CSC facilities, as needed.

#### Procurement Details

* **Contracting Entity (Entité contractante)**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Procurement Method (Méthode d'approvisionnement)**: Competitive - Open bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)
* **Selection Criteria (Critères de sélection)**: Lowest Price (Prix le plus bas)
* **Trade Agreements (Accords commerciaux)**: Various free trade agreements and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) are applied to this procurement.

#### Contact Information

* **Contact Name (Nom du contact)**: Nimuan, Kat (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email (Courriel du contact)**: [kat.nimuan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kat.nimuan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
